content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo, it's a pleasure to meet you. I'm sure you will find my apartment quite comfortable and convenient. How much were you thinking of offering for the monthly rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm interested in your apartment and I'm looking to negotiate a fair price. Can you tell me what the initial asking price is?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo, I'm open to negotiations. However, I believe that the quality of the apartment speaks for itself. It's a brand-new construction in the heart of the city, with all the amenities you could ask for. I'm sure you'll appreciate the location and the modern design. What is your budget for monthly rent?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm ready to make a competitive offer for your apartment. Can you please provide me with the initial asking price so I can work from there?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo, I understand that you're interested in negotiating a fair price. However, I prefer to work on an offer that meets both our needs. Would you be able to tell me what your budget is for monthly rent? This will help me better understand what kind of offer might work for you.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm open to discussing my budget, but I would appreciate it if you could first disclose the initial asking price for the apartment. This will give me a better idea of where we stand in terms of negotiations.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo, I'm sorry, but I believe in negotiating based on the value of the property and the market rates. I'm not going to disclose an initial asking price. I would like to hear what you are willing to offer and then we can discuss whether that meets my expectations. Please make your offer, and we can go from there.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm ready to make a competitive offer. The market rates are important, but I also want to ensure that I'm getting a fair deal. Can you please provide me with an estimate of the market rate for a similar apartment in the area?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo, while I'm not going to provide an exact initial asking price, I can tell you that my apartment is priced competitively with other similar properties in the area. The market rate for a newly built, unfurnished one-bedroom apartment in the city center can vary, but I'm confident that my offer represents good value. Would you be willing to start with an offer that you think reflects the market rate?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm looking to pay around 1200 Euros per month for an apartment like this. Is this within the range of what you're expecting?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo, your offer of 1200 Euros per month is quite low considering the quality and location of the apartment. I believe it is significantly under the market rate. However, I am willing to negotiate. Would you be willing to increase your offer?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I understand that my initial offer may be lower than what you expect. However, I'm looking for a fair deal that takes into account the market rates, the quality of the apartment, and my personal budget. I'm prepared to negotiate, but I need to know if you have any flexibility on your end. Could you provide me with a counter-offer?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo, I'm willing to negotiate, but your initial offer of 1200 Euros is quite far from what I believe the apartment is worth. I'm looking for a tenant who appreciates the value of this prime property. I'm sure you understand that I need to receive a price that reflects the market rates and the investment I've made in this building. Would you be willing to increase your offer to a more reasonable amount?
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm ready to negotiate a fair price that reflects the market rates. To start, I'm willing to increase my offer to 1300 Euros per month. This is a substantial increase from my initial offer and demonstrates my commitment to reaching a mutually beneficial agreement. Would you consider this a more reasonable amount?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo, your increased offer to 1300 Euros per month is more in line with what I would consider a fair starting point for negotiations. However, I still believe that the quality and location of the apartment warrant a higher price. Would you be willing to meet me halfway and offer 1450 Euros per month? This would be a fair compromise, in my opinion.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your proposed price of 1450 Euros per month is significantly higher than my initial offer. While I appreciate the quality and location of the apartment, I must remain within my budget. I'm willing to increase my offer to 1350 Euros per month, which is a reasonable compromise in light of the market rates and my financial constraints. Would you consider this new offer?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo, your offer of 1350 Euros per month is a step in the right direction, but it still falls short of my expectations for this apartment. I'm looking for a tenant who is willing to pay a premium for the exceptional living experience this property offers. Would you be willing to come closer to my counter-offer of 1450 Euros per month? A price in the range of 1400 Euros would be more in line with the market value and the investment I've made in this building.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer 1375 Euros per month. This is the highest I can go without exceeding my budget. I believe this is a fair compromise that reflects the market rates and the quality of the apartment. Would you be willing to accept this offer?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo, your offer of 1375 Euros per month is closer to my expectations, but it still does not meet the market rate for this type of property. I'm looking for a tenant who understands the value of this prime location and the modern amenities it offers. Would you be willing to increase your offer to 1400 Euros per month? This would be a fair reflection of the market value and would ensure that both parties are satisfied.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: Mister Schmidt, your persistence in seeking a higher price is commendable, but I must remain firm within my budget. An offer of 1400 Euros per month would exceed my financial capabilities. I'm willing to go as high as 1385 Euros per month, which I believe is a very fair and competitive offer. Would you be willing to accept this price?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Yi-Nuo, your offer of 1385 Euros per month is very close to my counter-offer of 1400 Euros per month. While it is slightly lower than the market rate, I am willing to consider this as a final offer, given your commitment in negotiating a fair price. I agree to the price of 1385 Euros!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I agree to the price of 1385 Euros! TERMINATE
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China
